track.name: Little Drop Of Poison
comments: They'll always find a way to make you pay.
did the devil make the world while god was sleeping
I feel so  much cleaner after it rains
This is a great song, but I can't figure out how to add him to my Last artists under this new system.  Anybody know?
This is an outstanding song, though it's kinda insane that it's in Shrek.
I vary wildly in what I think of Tom Waits songs, but this one is absolutely brilliant.
im all alone.. i smoke my friends down to the filter..
Well a rat ...always knows ...when he’s in ...with weasels…
i swear that is someone playing a saw in the background
classic waits. the sound, vocals, and the lyrics. LOVE IT.
"... I feel much cleaner after it rains."

I dont know if any other aging fans of mr. waits felt at one time like they were the only one in a strange flickering world of surfaces that knew of the dark mythopoesis of his work to feel really, really old and profoundly less hip upon hearing this was in shrek.  at somepoint in everyone's life, whether perceived as happy or sad, the universe calls "shennanigans".
...she always had that little drop of poison... Oh! It makes me want to have sex.
hooray a tom waits track, great gravelly voice, he must have smoked 100 a day
